document.title: WEL_TRACK_BAR
document.paragraph:
A ../../reference/wel_track_bar_chart.xmlWEL_TRACK_BAR control has a sliding pointer and optional tick marks.
2Appearance A ../../reference/wel_track_bar_chart.xmlWEL_TRACK_BAR created with make_horizontal.
images/wel_track_bar_horizontal.png wel_track_bar_horizontal
A ../../reference/wel_track_bar_chart.xmlWEL_TRACK_BAR created with make_vertical.
images/wel_track_bar_vertical.png wel_track_bar_vertical
